info.title: Resettle Place API
info.description: Power your location intelligence with comprehensive place data and cost of living insights. Our Place API delivers searchable geographic information for cities and regions worldwide, including coordinates, population, elevation, and aliases. Get real-time cost of living data to help users make informed relocation decisions. With fuzzy search and country filtering, integrate location-aware features into migration platforms, expat tools, or any application requiring rich place intelligence.

RapidAuth.description: If you don't currently have an API key, you can visit https://resettle.ai/dev to acquire a free one
RapidAuth.name: X-RapidAPI-Key

parameters.description: The scope of the searched places
